data.oai_dc:dc: Read alignments and deep-sequence phylogenies for individuals in the same potential transmission network in the population-based sample from Rakai, Uganda. The data can be used to reconstruct potential transmission networks, see the vignette at https://olli0601.github.io/Phyloscanner.R.utilities/index.html
Transmission networks|Infectious disease epidemiology|Phylogenetics|Deep-sequence phylogenetics|Phylodynamics|HIV prevention
